краткое название провинции Ляонин 辽宁; Династия Ляо или Киданей (907-1125)

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 辽)
Pictophonetic: 尞 indicates the sound; 辶 (walk) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
遼寧 [ liáo níng ]: Liaoning province in northeast China, short name 辽
遼闊 [ liáo kuò ]: vast; extensive
遼遠 [ liáo yuǎn ]: distant; far away; remote

heisig_chinese_memo: Far away from civilisation, there are no camping sites, so you can see people in a pup tent near the road doing some wild camping instead.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You got off your scooter to load some charcoal onto it, when it suddenly took off into the distance! That's some powerful charcoal.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Your scooter is charcoal powered, but it looks like you put too much in there and it drove off into the distance without you.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You chase the scooter into the distance when you see it heading for a lake. Oh good, it should be stopped by the water. But wait! In the distance you see your scooter drive onto a row (りょう) boat and... row itself through the water?! No!!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: In the distance you can still make out the shape of your scooter, now on a row boat, fading away and completely out of reach.
Ru_Notes: Ляо — государство кидань-монголов, которое занимало просторы Северо-Восточного Китая с 907 г. до мятежа чжурчжэней в 1125 г. Киданьская империя.

Ru_trainchinese:
liáo: (сущ) (сокр.) провинция Ляонин; династия (907-1125)
liáo: (графема) далекий, широкий
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a move (⻌) would be complementary (尞) if you're distant
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A road you travell-ed a long time ago is far away in the past.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "辵", "尞" sound. The original meaning is far away and far away. "Said Wen": "Liao, far away. Cong Lei, La Sheng." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. The Eighth Years of Xianggong": "The Chu Master is far away, and the food will be exhausted, and he will return quickly. What is the trouble?" "Chu Ci. Chapter Nine. "Thinking": "Only the long way to go, the soul will die overnight."

" Liao " is extended to mean wide and empty. Such as "Selected Works. Zhao Jingzhen's "Book of Qi with Ji Mao": "If the eyes are flat, the Liaokuo will be innocent; if you listen to Xiuyuan, you will be drowned and lonely." Tang Dynasty Bai Juyi "Jieshu": "Looking southeast with open eyes, looking far away at Liao Of course."

" Liao " also means the longevity of time. For example, Ruan Ji of the Three Kingdoms of the Three Kingdoms "Ying Huai" in the 80: "Life is happy for a long time, and a hundred years speaks Liao to himself." Northern Song Su Zhe "In the Gorge": "Liao Zai ten thousand years, Yu died in prison."

" Liao " is also the ancient water name, ancient domain name, and ancient county name. Such as "Lu's Spring and Autumn. "Youshi": "What is Liuchuan? River, Chishui, Liaoshui, Heishui, Jiangshui, Huaishui." "Historical Records. "Yanzhao Gong Family": "Thirty-three years, the Qin pulled out the Liaodong, the king of Yan took joy, and the death of Yan." Later it was used as the dynasty name, referring to the dynasty established by the Qidan Yelü Abaoji in northern China during the Northern Song Dynasty. The Liao State was destroyed by the Jin State.
humanum_short_description_en: From "辵", "尞" sound. The original meaning is far away and far away.
humanum_full_description:
從「辵」，「尞」聲。本義是遙遠、遼遠。《說文》：「遼，遠也。从辵，尞聲。」如《左傳．襄公八年》：「楚師遼遠，糧食將盡，必將速歸，何患焉？」《楚辭．九章．抽思》：「惟郢路之遼遠兮，魂一夕而九逝。」

　　「遼」引申表示寬闊、空曠。如《文選．趙景真〈與嵇茂齊書〉》：「肆目平隰，則遼廓而無覩；極聽脩原，則淹寂而無聞。」唐代白居易〈截樹〉：「開懷東南望，目遠心遼然。」

　　「遼」也表示時間的久遠。如三國魏阮籍〈咏懷〉之八十：「人生樂長久，百年自言遼。」北宋蘇轍〈入峽〉：「遼哉千萬年，禹死遺跡牢。」

　　「遼」還是古水名、古域名和古郡名等。如《呂氏春秋．有始》：「何謂六川？河水，赤水，遼水，黑水，江水，淮水。」《史記．燕召公世家》：「三十三年，秦拔遼東，虜燕王喜，卒滅燕。」後來又用為朝代名，指北宋年間契丹族耶律阿保機在中國北部所建立的王朝，後來遼國被金國所滅。
humanum_short_description: 從「辵」，「尞」聲。本義是遙遠、遼遠。

從「 辵 」，「 尞 」聲。本義是遙遠、遼遠。《說文》：「遼，遠也。从辵，尞聲。」如《左傳．襄公八年》：「楚師遼遠，糧食將盡，必將速歸，何患焉？」《楚辭．九章．抽思》：「惟郢路之遼遠兮，魂一夕而九逝。」 「 遼 」引申表示寬闊、空曠。如《文選．趙景真〈與嵇茂齊書〉》：「肆目平隰，則遼廓而無覩；極聽脩原，則淹寂而無聞。」唐代白居易〈截樹〉：「開懷東南望，目遠心遼然。」 「 遼 」也表示時間的久遠。如三國魏阮籍〈咏懷〉之八十：「人生樂長久，百年自言遼。」北宋蘇轍〈入峽〉：「遼哉千萬年，禹死遺跡牢。」 「 遼 」還是古水名、古域名和古郡名等。如《呂氏春秋．有始》：「何謂六川？河水，赤水，遼水，黑水，江水，淮水。」《史記．燕召公世家》：「三十三年，秦拔遼東，虜燕王喜，卒滅燕。」後來又用為朝代名，指北宋年間契丹族耶律阿保機在中國北部所建立的王朝，後來遼國被金國所滅。
From " 辵", " 尞" sound. The original meaning is far away and far away. "Said Wen": "Liao, far away. Cong Lei, La Sheng." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. The Eighth Years of Xianggong": "The Chu Master is far away, and the food will be exhausted, and he will return quickly. What is the trouble?" "Chu Ci. Chapter Nine. "Thinking": "Only the long way to go, the soul will die overnight." " Liao" is extended to mean wide and empty. Such as "Selected Works. Zhao Jingzhen's "Book of Qi with Ji Mao": "If the eyes are flat, the Liaokuo will be innocent; if you listen to Xiuyuan, you will be drowned and lonely." Tang Dynasty Bai Juyi "Jieshu": "Looking southeast with open eyes, looking far away at Liao Of course." " Liao" also means the longevity of time. For example, Ruan Ji of the Three Kingdoms of the Three Kingdoms "Ying Huai" in the 80: "Life is happy for a long time, and a hundred years speaks Liao to himself." Northern Song Su Zhe "In the Gorge": "Liao Zai ten thousand years, Yu died in prison." " Liao" is also the ancient water name, ancient domain name, and ancient county name. Such as "Lu's Spring and Autumn. "Youshi": "What is Liuchuan? River, Chishui, Liaoshui, Heishui, Jiangshui, Huaishui." "Historical Records. "Yanzhao Gong Family": "Thirty-three years, the Qin pulled out the Liaodong, the king of Yan took joy, and the death of Yan." Later it was used as the dynasty name, referring to the dynasty established by the Qidan Yelü Abaoji in northern China during the Northern Song Dynasty. The Liao State was destroyed by the Jin State.

遼字的基本解释

遼
liáo
见“辽”。

遼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liáo］
［《廣韻》落蕭切，平蕭，來。］
“勞3”的被通假字。“辽1”的繁体字。
(1)遥远。
(2)开阔；远大。
(3)久远。
(4)疏远。
(5)差距大；悬殊。
(6)朝代名。公元916年契丹族领袖耶律阿保机创建，在我国北部。初名契丹，947年改称辽，983年复称契丹，1066年再改称辽，1125年为金所灭。
(7)区域名。指辽东或辽西。
(8)辽河的简称。
(9)辽宁省的简称。
(10)通“僚”。

遼字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　遼； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1265第24
【唐韻】落蕭切【集韻】【韻會】憐蕭切【正韻】連條切，?音僚。【說文】遠也。【楚辭·九歎】山修遠其遼遼兮。　又【集韻】水名，在遼陽縣。　又【韻會】國名，契丹之後，至耶律德光，號大遼。

遼字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
遼字的起名意思

同“辽”。

Liao
Basic explanation of words
Liao
liáo
See "Liao".
Liao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liáo］
["Guangyun" falls off Xiaoqie, Pingxiao, come. ]
"Labor 3" was passed falsely. Traditional characters for "辽1".
(1) Far away.
(2) Open; lofty.
(3) A long time.
(4) Alienation.
(5) The gap is large; the disparity is great.
(6) Dynasty names. Yelu Abaoji, the leader of the Khitan tribe, was founded in 916 AD in the north of our country. Originally named Qidan, it was renamed Liao in 947, renamed Qidan in 983, renamed Liao in 1066, and was destroyed by Jinsuo in 1125.
(7) Area name. Refers to Liaodong or Liaoxi.
(8) The abbreviation of Liaohe.
(9) Abbreviation for Liaoning Province.
(10) Through "Leader".
Liao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [The Department of Characters] 　 Liao; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1265 Page 24
[Tang Yun] Luo Xiaoqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Pity Xiaoqie [Zheng Yun] Cut one after another,? The sound officer. [Said Wen] Far away. [Songs of Chu·Nine Sighs] Shan Xiu is far away from Liao Liao Xi.　[Jiyun] The name of the water, in Liaoyang County.　[Yunhui] The name of the country, after the Khitan, to Yelu Deguang, named Daliao.

liáo
вм. 辽
Radicals: 尞  (charcoal, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
You got off your scooter to load some charcoal onto it, when it suddenly took off into the distance! That's some powerful charcoal.
Your scooter is charcoal powered, but it looks like you put too much in there and it drove off into the distance without you.
Reading Mnemonic
You chase the scooter into the distance when you see it heading for a lake. Oh good, it should be stopped by the water. But wait! In the distance you see your scooter drive onto a row (りょう) boat and... row itself through the water?! No!!
In the distance you can still make out the shape of your scooter, now on a row boat, fading away and completely out of reach.
